member.name: M:WebApi.Host.Controllers.DistanceController.#ctor(Roomex.Core.Interfaces.Services.IGeoLocationService,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{WebApi.Host.Controllers.DistanceController})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DistanceController.

member.name: M:WebApi.Host.Controllers.DistanceController.Get(System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.Double,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the distance between two coordinates.
member.param: The latitude of the first coordinate.
The longitude of the first coordinate.
The latitude of the second coordinate.
The longitude of the second coordinate.
The unit for the distance, either 'K' for kilometers or 'M' for miles.
member.returns: The distance between the coordinates in the given distance unit.
